nodes.text: A Caregiver was a female Chiss assigned to take care of ozyly-esehembos. Originally, all caregivers were former ozyly-esehembos, though that practice eventually faded away. Mitth'ali'astov served as the Caregiver to Che'ri while aboard the Springhawk. Che'ri called her caregiver a "momish." Caregivers accompanied ozyly-esehembos on their journeys, often with the Chiss Expansionary Defense Fleet, though both were considered civilians.
Among other duties, caregivers were responsible for feeding and bathing the sky-walkers under their care.
